hooks.pre-commit: npm run pre-commit || echo '** NOT COMMITTED: Build issues! **'
hooks.pre-push: git diff --quiet || echo '** NOT PUSHED: Uncommitted changes! **'

scripts.clean: echo 'rm -rf dist/*  # (but not really, at least yet)'
scripts.lint:md-diff: git diff-tree --no-commit-id --name-only -r HEAD -- '*.md' | xargs -I FILE npx markdown-link-check FILE
scripts.lint:md-all: git ls-files '*.md' | xargs -I FILE npx markdown-link-check -q FILE
